page.title: Connect to a Meshtastic device
page.description: Add a device connection via HTTP, Bluetooth, or Serial. Your saved connections will be saved in your browser.

areYouSure: This will remove {{name}}. You canot undo this action.

noConnections.title: No connections yet.
noConnections.description: Create your first connection. It will connect immediately and be saved for later.

toasts.checkConnetion: Check your device or settings and try again
toasts.pickConnectionAgain: Could not connect. You may need to reselect the device/port.
toasts.savedCantConnect: The connection was saved but could not connect.
